question: Im 14 weeks and they told me I have severe gestational diabetes. With taking blood 4 times a day and sending it in. I'm 19 with this being my first pregnancy and I'm really scared just because there are so menu issues going on. Since I got pregnant I've lost 20 lbs. High blood pressure now. Plus I now have to see a special physical therapist for my hip. Any words of wisdom?
title: gestational diabetes?
